basics.name: Jonas Genath
basics.label: Data Scientist, AI and ML Developer, and Data Visualization Expert

work.name: Technical University of Ilmenau
work.summary: Group for Information and Knowledge Management (Werner Bischoff Building Room F1100).
highlights: Operational and strategic management of the project team for the digitalization of programming training by introducing an autograder into the university IT infrastructure

Digitization of programming education by introducing an autograder into the university IT infrastructure and developing unit and integration tests to check the programmed tasks
Teaching responsibilities include teaching beginners how to program with Python

projects.name: SUNRISE
projects.summary: EU-funded cooperation project. Dissemination of results on the application and development of an autograder in programming education at other universities within the Europe-wide project alliance

projects.name: AutoPING
projects.summary: AutoPING demonstrates how modern programming education can be made more efficient and practical through automated assessment systems such as CodeOcean. The project promotes digital, competence-oriented learning, AI integration, and modular critical testing scenarios—valuable impetus for the further development of teaching at TU Ilmenau and beyond.
highlights: Containerized automated assessment system
AI integration
Digital learning
Integration via the LMT interface

projects.name: DaWiS
projects.summary: The aim of the project was to transfer the method of knowledge discovery in simulation data, which had previously been considered mainly in academic case studies in the field of production and logistics, into practice. To this end, smart experiment design methods were evaluated and implemented, methods for the (cloud-based) distribution of experiments were developed, and suitable data mining and visual analytics methods were implemented. These methods were designed and implemented in an integrated platform.
highlights: Integrated into the commercial software SimAssist
Cloud-based execution of simulation experiments
Python interface developed for integration of Machine Learning methods

volunteer.summary: Handball player, helper in the elementary school league, and in other volunteer organization activities.
highlights: Advancing from the 'Landesliga' to the 'Oberliga' in the 2023/2024 season

volunteer.summary: Organization of workshops for students to exchange ideas about different cultures from around the world.
